name: Geo Lander
description: I'm not trying to repeat what I wrote in the game but there are a couple things I should mention here. First of all READ THE INFO section in game it will explain a lot. Secondly there are hidden Bonus landings that you should try and find. Thirdly IF THE NEXT LEVEL AFTER LANDING DOES NOT LOAD IN 3 SECONDS THEN WIGLE YOUR SHIP AROUND this is a bug that I could not fix.
